wiki.summary: A powerful violin piece that resonates with passion and focus

track.name: Raga Kirvani: Tanam
comments:
L Subbu's classic .. Thanam is the spontaneous improvisation on the Raga (melody scale) with characteristic rhythmic bowing without percussion..
Kirvani is alos an anicient raaga also found in some eastern european folk music.
this is just the thanam part of the section called ragam, thanam, pallavi... good work by L Sub
